DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare plasma pharmacokinetics ( PK ) single dose MK-3682B [ MK-3682/grazoprevir ( MK-5172 ) /ruzasvir ( MK-8408 ) fix dose combination ( FDC ) ] participant moderate ( Part 1 ) severe ( Part 2 ) renal insufficiency ( RI ) healthy participant .
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics MK-3682B Participants With Moderate Severe Renal Insufficiency ( MK-3682B-030 )
